In this digital age, do you think modern inventions have made our lives simpler, or more complex and dangerous? Discuss with examples…

          Technology is the gift to the human being. In the present scenario modern invention like cell phones, satellites, television etc....playing an important role in human life.

              Modern technology have changed the way of thinking and acting of people.

for example:

                Internet : it is used for exchange of information and extracting information. with the help of internet there are many jobs can be handled and it also acts as an source of employment

                 Television: source of media and entertainment.

                 Computers: most important invention of Charles Babbage. This gadget is used in almost in every field of business and in every sector.

                 Cell phone: it has become a common man equipment, communication has became easy.

                 Defence equipment: this is the basis for every country to work on it. in order to protect from the other enemy countries this really important. Inventions like atom bombs ,guns etc...have to be more improved.

                  There are many advantages with the technology namely:

a) Saves time:100 people work can be done by a single machine.

b) Reliable :accuracy is maintained.

c) Cost effective: once installed only maintenance charges occurs.

             As every coin has two sides, there are even disadvantages/negative impressions on the modern INNOVATIONS.

                   In the present world" man is not using technology, technology is using the man".

There are many adverse effects by using modern inventions , such as....

        By installing modern equipment in the manufacturing concerns, many labours are out of there jobs.

         Internet: Through hacking it has become a part worst these days. information is stolen and sometimes the money through salami slicing.

         Television: In case of more watching of television, it leads to eye sight and sometimes it can be considered as a idiotic box where hours together of time is wasted.

         Defence equipment: During the war there are many victims who suffered with atom bombs etc..

example Hiroshima and Nagasaki.

        Main reasons for the loopholes of the modern technology is:

a) People rather spending time with machines rather than family members and friends.

b) Using technology for useless purpose like face book and other social networking sites.

          I consider using face book as working in the company without any salary.ie; working as the benefit for others.

c) Wastage of time in case of in case of speaking on phone for useless purpose, surfing internet for the sake of time pass etc.

            There fore modern inventions are to be utilised only for the well being of humans not their ruin. Technology should make the man complete but not a lazy bugs........ in every case it should be the mindset of the individual how to use a gadget.
